Summary: Biochemical reaction from 3,4-dihydroxyphenylacetaldehyde to 3,4-dihydroxyphenylacetic acid. This interaction can be catalyzed by ALDH2 or ALDH1A1.
Biochemical reaction from levodopa to dopamine. This interaction is catalyzed by DDC.
Biochemical reaction from dopamine to 3,4-dihydroxyphenylacetaldehyde. This interaction can be catalyzed by MAOA or MAOB.
Biochemical reaction from dopamine to 3-methoxytyramine. This interaction is catalyzed by COMT.
Biochemical reaction from homovanillin to homovanillic acid. This interaction can be catalyzed by ALDH1A1 or ALDH2.
Biochemical reaction from 3-methoxytyramine to homovanillin. This interaction can be catalyzed by MAOA or MAOB.
Biochemical reaction from 3,4-dihydroxyphenylacetic acid to homovanillic acid. This interaction is catalyzed by COMT.
Biochemical reaction from l-tyrosine to levodopa. This interaction is catalyzed by TH.
